R

REPORTING_LEVEL_1 - Static variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSimulator
Simulator's reporting level 1.
REPORTING_LEVEL_2 - Static variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPSimulator
Simulator's reporting level 2:
Reports every new TCP segment that is created.
Router - class ch4.tcp.Router.
This class is a simple simulation of a network router.
Router(int, int) - Constructor for class ch4.tcp.Router
Constructor silently enforces that this router does introduce a resource bottleneck in the network.
rcvBuffer - Variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPReceiver
The receiver buffer to buffer the segments that arrive out-of-sequence.
rcvWindow - Variable in class ch4.tcp.TCPReceiver
Receive window size, in bytes.
receive(TCPSegment[], TCPSegment[]) - Method in class ch4.tcp.TCPReceiver
Receives the segments from the sender, passes the ones that arrived in-order to the application.
relay(TCPSegment[]) - Method in class ch4.tcp.Router
Lets the first #bufferSize packets pass unaffected and discards the rest up to #mismatchRatio.
resetMonitoringVariables() - Method in class ch4.tcp.TCPSenderTahoe
Helper method to reset the variables monitoring the signs for packet loss.
run(int) - Method in class ch4.tcp.TCPSimulator
Runs the simulator for the given number of transmission rounds (iterations).
